page.title: 16A STREET IN RAMSGATE
page.content: Hardres Street is near the town centre of Ramsgate.The flats are modern being built of brick with concrete balconies :-each block has about 24 individual flats and at the rear of Brunswick Court there is a car park.Flats on the ground floor have gardens and to gain access to the flats you need to know someone living there because there is a security system which is operated by the residents automatically opening the front door for you. On the opposite side of the road the buildings are much older and more delapidated.These also have gardens.Some of the houses have been converted into shops and even funeral parlours! Hardres Street itself is quite a busy one-way street which is used by many shoppers as short term parking for up to one hour free.
